p: The results are presented as the mean Â± standard error of the mean. The analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Dunnett's test was performed for the comparison between more than two experimental groups. The comparison between two experimental groups was performed by the Newman-Keuls test. The statistical analyses were performed using the statistical program GraphPad Prism 5 (GraphPad Software Inc., USA). The data were considered significant when the P value was <0.05.
